data.name: CodFiscChangeWarning
data.value: We remind you that the Program can be exclusively utilized by the User who purchased the Program and the information details of which has to correspond to the EULA (End User License Agreement) Licensee details. The User identifier (more specifically the Fiscal Code) can be modified only if such corporate event happens: corporate merger of the Licensee, 100% transferral of the licensee. Any form of sale, distribution, loan, hire, rental, lease, or any other type of Program transferral is therefore forbidden, as explicitly declared by article 5) of the EULA (End Users License Agreement).
